places.name: The Docks
places.description: The docks are where all the expensive things enter Right Leg

places.name: Historic Auction House
places.description: This historic landmark is where the really big things are sold during auction week

places.name: The Gargoyle House
places.description: This is an old spooky house covered with gargoyles.

places.name: Goblin Town
places.description: Where all the goblins live. Full of unique foods.

places.name: The Opera House
places.description: Where all the best shows are performed.

places.name: Right Leg Temple
places.description: An old step pyramid temple where the Yuan-ti used to sacrifice prisoners. Probably.

places.name: The Fight Pits
places.description: Where the best fights are held. The most popular game on the island is 'Hook the Plank.'
